column4: hey everyone i got beryl but i cant get to where you can change animations and stuff
no

abort
thats what i got

got it
its downloading
k now what
Try to start beryl-manager again -- should be under applications somewhere
You should just be able to pick what you want and then hit "quit"
After you go to "swtich window manager" and hit "beryl"
k, hmm
what are you trying to add?
like the burning and stuff?
if you go to beryl settings manager and then "visual effects" on that next window, do you have "animations" listed on the left?
do you have one called beryl settings manager?
That's where the burning and stuff is on mine
mine was in "beryl settings manager" > "visual effects" > "Animations" > then under "Close" I did "Burn" for #1 and #2
And make sure animations is checked
This is what Linux is all about, man
you mean in your ubuntu, or in windows itself?
